text: Kahi tumhi nahi pahile ki allahaneca dharaticya samasta vastu tumacya adhina kelya aheta ani tyacya adesane samudrata calanarya nauka dekhila. Tyaneca akasala savaruna thevale ahe ki dharativara tyacya hukumavina kosaluna na padave. Nihsansaya allaha, lokansathi motha snehasila, daya karanara ahe
